## ElementProps.listeners property

Event listeners

**Signature:**

```typescript
listeners?: Array<{
        type: string;
        listener: EventListenerOrEventListenerObject | ((e: Event) => void) | null | undefined;
        options?: boolean | AddEventListenerOptions;
    }>;
```
